name: PONG.EXE
description:
This is a .exe / haunted game based on pong. disturbing pictures, loud sounds, etc. but it's actually a game with an end and all. Basically the game is trying to distract you from winning with all the nonsense.

And yes it cheats.

"kid mode" changes all images and sounds to kid friendly versions and disables most of the cheating. also some minor changes to the overall game to give the player a slightly easier time scoring.

I first put on gamejolt almost a year ago and I thought I would see how it does on itch.io.
